name: OYO 636 Apartmen Kak Okoh
address: I, Jalan Sahadewa, Munggu, Mengwi, Badung Regency Bali, Munggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: The room felt comfortable to stay. Access to Tanah Lot is about 10 minutes by motorbike. The guard is friendly. Recommended for backpackers. The area is near rice fields, quiet and also nice ambience.
review 2: Accessibility is quite close to nearby tourist attractions. Affordable prices for a quiet and nice ambience location (near rice fields). Cleanliness is good and prices are quite okay for backpacker.
review 3: This is a beautiful place in mengwi. The rooms are clean, also there is wooden bungalows scattered around in a lush garden environment. The staff is very attentive and helpful.
review 4: Lots of attractions to visit in the nearby area. This is one of the beautiful places in the munggu area. Nice ambience, there are wooden bungalows scattered around the lush garden environment. Great service :)
review 5: The location are beautiful and quiet. Accessibility to nearby tourist destinations is easy. This unique property is recommended for those who want to vacation in the munggu area.

name: OYO 1207 Pondok 789 Near Canggu Echo beach
address: Jl. Sahadewa, Munggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: I came here already on 2018. The room is clean, bed comfy and views to a ricefield. It is in a quiet area, but still close to Canggu if you need to go to any of its coworking spaces. Very convenient. If I come back to Canggu I'll book it again
review 2: This hotel is an excellent value for the price. I was honestly expecting it to be very bare bones and minimal cleanliness for the bargain price, but it was a good accommodation. The room was pretty clean, the beds and bathroom felt clean and fresh. The shower water did get hot and the AC worked well. There was even a TV with Netflix! It was a small room but had 2 bedside tables to put things on. We saw a few trails of ants leading to the bathroom trash bin, and a few in the room, but not a huge problem. Bugs can easily get in from the "windows" that are basically holes in the wall with plastic taped poorly over them, but surprisingly we never had any issues with mosquitoes coming in at night. (We aimed the AC fan right on us to deter bugs) It was easy to find. Unfortunately we were also right next to the lobby and it got very loud at night sometimes if people decided to hang out. Very easy to hear everything that people are saying if they're within 20 meters of the door. A bit far from the things we wanted to do in Canggu but easy to reach with a motorbike. Overall would definitely recommend this place!
review 3: Room is adequately comfortable. Staff are pretty unfriendly and unhelpful. On my first day of check in, there wasn‚Äôt anybody and I had to spend time contacting the staff. They were also very slow in their response on their whatsapp and do ignore most times. My bathroom drainage was clogged and not even clear when I entered.
review 4:
To any concerned reader :) !

The hotel was very welcoming, prepared and professional. The rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable. Each room has it own seating area with a beautiful view.

Late at night If you need anything there is a bell to ring and the hotel is flexible with check in and check out times. If you want food, They also have a restaurant a very short walk away or you can order it to you‚Äôre room.
The hotel is with in short drive of everything you need and you can rent a bike from the hotel, get a taxi or a grab. As you can tell by my review I was over the moon with this hotel and I would highly recommend and will also be coming back.

Thank you again for my wonderful stay.
review 5: Clean rooms. Good airco. Great value for money. Deducted 2 stars because the cab driver arranged by the hotel tried to scam us into paying 400k for a 50k ride. Also were rude the day of check out for no reason. Still great value for money tho.

name: Warung Cantik
address: 94H9+3VP, Jl. By Pass Tanah Lot, Cemagi, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: I‚Äôm gonna give my first google review to this place as I was shocked that the rating was not high but they did make the fish super delicious. They deserve 5 stars. Also here has the stunning sunset. Highly recommended!
review 2: Overall was good, the food, service especially the ambience, super cozy and breeze with rice paddy view
review 3:
Brought here by a local friend, a truly balinese seafood restaurant devoid of all tourists.

The clams with that special sauce was mindblowingly good!! The sauce was sweet, salty and smoky! We started with one plate and had a total of 6 plates by the end of our evening. We also had grilled fish, grilled prawns and some fish head soup. Everything was fresh, delicious and so affordable.

Ambience was great! Paddy fields in front of you with almost no traffic noise from the surrounding. This place is definitely worth a special trip there.
review 4: Not so many choices of food. Klo malem gelap banget.. banyak nyamuk. Good food with affordable price, specially the grilled fish and grilled cockle shells (kerang bakar) with special sauce. I love the grilled clams. Very comfrot with gazebo and rice field view. Recommended!
review 5: Actually their menu's tasty but i hope next time "sambal matah" can be hotter than now ü§≠ü§≠

name: Mirai Sushi
address: Munggu, Mengwi, Badung Regency, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: This is some delicious sushi! The service was incredibly quick too considering I was in a group of 9 people! The two dishes in the videos are the Sushi Deluxe and the Volcano roll. I recommend both! It‚Äôs a great spot to go with a group or just as a couple too! Prices were reasonable.
review 2:
We make Mirai Sushi our weekly ritual for the freshest sushi in town.
The ambiance is always upbeat, and the food is consistently fresh and delicious. Our kids adore it too! With its healthy and tasty options, coupled with a wonderful team, it's our go-to spot. The strategic location with ample parking is a big plus. The sushi is super fresh and incredibly yummy, making it a family favorite. Already looking forward to our next weekend visit to Mirai Sushi!
review 3: Sushi Mirai is my absolute favorite sushi spot! What sets it apart is the owner, who also happens to be the chef‚Äî a local gem who's always hands-on during operations. The freshness of their ingredients is great. While my go-to, tuna tataki, isn't on the menu, they happily whip it up whenever I ask. It's my go-to spot for sushi, and it's been incredible watching them grow. Best of luck!
review 4:
It was so delicious that I didn't have time to take pictures of the dishes)
Very fresh fish, delicious sushi and friendly staff.
Despite the heavy load, the order was prepared in 7-10 minutes.
I will definitely come back to try other rolls and take pictures of them))))
review 5: Top place since long time. The food is always super fresh, had zero disappointments, and was ordering from the restaurant regularly. Came to dine in today and was surprised in a good way! The stuff is doing great job. The place isn‚Äôt fancy, but it is comfy and clean. Best resto in this price segment. ü§ç

name: Warung 789 & Kopi Kita 789
address: Jl. Sahadewa No.6, Munggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
Chicken Nasi Goreng as my lunch menu taste good, not too oily. Price affordable!
The place made out of bamboo, is also good and breezy with rice field view.
The service is good and quick.
Definitely recommended and will come back for their other menu.
review 2: Authentic Balinese foods at an affordable price. My favorites are the betutu chicken and duck.
review 3: I can really recommend this restaurant when you are in Canggu area. I ate here several times and I really enjoyed it. The food is decent and the prices are good! The staff is very nice and friendly. In the evening it has a very nice atmosphere because there are a lot of locals with their kids and the garden with the lights are very beautiful. It‚Äôs my favourite restaurant here and I eat here almost every day üòä
review 4: The coffee taste good,because they use Prodigy's coffee bean. Food also taste good, I love the croissant. Small place for the coffee spot, but you can sit inside the restaurant if the front seat are full.. Will try the restaurant menu next time.
review 5: I've been in Bali for 14 weeks and have eaten at plenty of warungs, but this place is honestly my favourite in all of Bali. These guys know how to cook chicken!

name: The Little Korean Kitchen
address: Jl. Sahadewa I, Munggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
I've been a patron here for years. My favs are Sundubu jjigae (perfect for rainy days) and spicy chicken. Sometimes i buy their kimchi too for cooking at home. It's so good and worth the price, better than supermarket bought.
What i appreciate is the owner takes feedback seriously. The best korean restaurant in the area.
review 2: Seafood sundubu-jjigae was my fav! You should try it out. Well seasoned, balanced taste, yummy! The spicy beef was good too and a lot of condiment. The staff and owner was very friendly and have a homey atmosphere, cute details.
review 3:
A beautiful Balinese soul cooking Korean food in munggu‚Ä¶  since moving to Kedungu area, I‚Äôve been reluctant to go all the way to pererenan for my Korean food fix, especially with all the rain these days.  So I pope‚Äôs invite to the little Korean kitchen with little expectation and was surprised to find a gem of a place where Korean food was given an Indonesian twist that was satisfying.

I was skeptical when I saw dolsot bibimbap on the menu‚Ä¶ meaning stone bowl bibimbap. I asked to be sure it was and was reassured it will be a hot stone bowl. It turned out it was a hot stone bowl but not the typical ones you see in Korea. But it was ok, because the bowl was hot enough to make the rice crispy and stick to the bowl to make  nuerenge.   I love this as we add water and make rice soup ‚Ä¶. Yummmmmm. See picture.

The bowl was a bit small and so the vegetables were mostly cooked and while different when mixed with jochojang, it was very good. They provided 3  banchans, kimchi, pickled cucumbers and savory potato. It was not blanched as well as it could to be a bit more crispy but it was good enough to satisfy my Korean food craving.

Then the Korean pancake ‚Ä¶. I could not finish it all but it was good.  I think it can be a little more crispy and maybe adding kimchi or so thing else to give it a more distinct flavor would make it outstanding but it is a new dish they added and I am sure it will evolve into something that is distinctly Indonesian Korean food.

That is what make this place great.  It‚Äôs Korean food but twisted for the local taste.  I‚Äôve rated Korean food all over the world and it‚Äôs never the same. It‚Äôs always best when it‚Äôs unexpectedly blended with the love of another culture.  Well done lovely lady. Your Seoul speaks Korean but your heart is baliüòç
review 4: Best authentic Korean food with good prices! You can ask for less spicy or more spicy for your jiggae. Nice banchan too. I used to eat Korean food at Pererenan but here is better. Just a bit hot, no AC.
review 5:
I was not in the good condition, but this Korean food cures me!
Kimchi Jjigae tastes like a real Korean one. They follows recipes very well. Best Korean food you can get in Canggu area.

name: Kubu D'Carik
address: Jl. Tunon Asri No.11, Munggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: Tap water contaminated with sand. Have rats in the room. Nice view and location though.
review 3: Beautiful place and very friendly staff

name: Rock-STR Guesthouse
address: 94GF+2F6, Munggu, Mengwi, Badung Regency, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: This place definitely is 5 stars! Everyone and everything about this spot is awesome! Location, quiet, pool, staff, comfy beds and hot water!
review 2:
How can I contact the property? I am interested in staying there.
Thank you in advance :)
review 3: I had a great stay at this guesthouse in Canggu. The upper room had a nice garden view. Particularly loved the refreshing pool which was a delight after a long day. Thanks to clear signage, the guesthouse was easy to locate. The room met all my expectations, and the fast Wi-Fi and air-conditioned co-working space were very useful for my work. A massive thanks to Yudha, the ever-helpful and warm manager üòä The location is close to the center of Canggu and there are rice fields nearby. Highly recommend!
review 4: Got an awesome stay here! I liked the co-working space and the open kitchen. Got a lot done here and won some new friends. Communication to the owner was nice as well. :)
review 5: Great spot, good coffee perfect place to work at their co-working space. Good vibes

name: A&W guest house
address: Jl. Gatotkaca, Munggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80232, Indonesia
review 1:
Room is large, bed is comfortable.   Chairs & table were not.  Bathroom lacks basic amenities like shelf/cabinet space, feels like a prison.  Lacks proper closet/cabinet.

Value for $ is poor.  Canggu guesthouse/villa prices, in spite being located 20min outside.  Area is relatively quiet and residential, except around public holidays where there will be loud noises/music/dance late into the early morning (Balinese tradition however, so there's no changing that).

Workers lacked tact and professionalism.  Manager falsely claimed minimum stay was a month, while my neighbors were a revolving door of tourist short-term stays. Then would send a message last minute saying rent was going up every month (without reason).  Definitely tried to take advantage of the fact I was an American tourist - other residents didn't receive such treatment.

One neighbor was a creep, walking in common areas his underwear or sitting outside, staring at myself and other residents, making us all feel uncomfortable.  Then verbally harassed me during his last week. Definitely lock your doors and hide your belongings if you stay here, given the tenants can be a bit sketch.

The guesthouse is near Seseh, a really nice residential area that has everything you need nearby.  Highly recommend the area, but not this guest house.
review 2:
I love this place! I lived here for 3 months and think it‚Äôs the perfect spot. The rooms are big, very clean, and so comfortable. There‚Äôs a TV which has its own channels or you can hook up your laptop with a HDMI cable. The AC is good, and the bathroom has hot water and is, again, very clean. There‚Äôs a shared kitchen, with microwave, stove, utensils, crockery and cutlery, as well as a fridge and free water (hot and cold). The courtyard has enough room for bikes and each room has chairs outside and a drying rack.
The owner is clear in communication on WhatsApp and the Komang (staff) is very helpful and friendly.
The location is perfect in my opinion, it‚Äôs down a small lane off the main road so it‚Äôs quiet. There‚Äôs lots of local warungs around, but it‚Äôs only a 10-15 minute drive into central Canggu if you need to go in.
Highly recommend staying at A&W guesthouse! Great place at great value. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

name: Ngah Nick Kost
address: 94GF+74C, Munggu, Mengwi, Badung Regency, Bali 80351, Indonesia

name: SizzleWraps
address: Jl. By Pass Tanah Lot, Munggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: Hmm mixed feelings. The nachos was okay and the guacamole was good but I was surprised that they charged me 20% higher than in the menu. Nachos was said 75k in the menu including tax but I was charged 90k in the final receipt (it was manual receipt anyway, not a printed one). The beverages price were similar to menu. No announcement that the price is different, and there was no debit card payment option. It feels like to shop in a traditional market with fluctuating price rather than a restaurant ü§∑üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è think I won't go back here.
review 2: One of my favourite restaurants in Bali! I've been there for a couple of times and it was nice for both üòç The staffs are so friendly and kind. They provide the welcome snack as well. That cute! The price is reasonable (55k per each) but there was a lot of mosquitos anyways they also provide the protector spray for customers :)
review 3: Amazing warung on the road, I tried it coming back from Seseh Beach where I enjoyed a wonderful sunset. Great Street food based on burritos and wraps, super nice, kind and smiling staff that offered also some chips to taste their sauces. The burrito was filled with fresh and and good ingredients that they prepare in front of you! Stop here don't hesitate!
review 4:
I had an expectation that this was a restaurant, however, it seems like the photos are old and they‚Äôve moved to a new place that is much much small.

I ordered the burrito bowl, overall the taste was pretty decent, it was not a classic Mexican take. What are the things that I question was the use of carrots in the vegetable ingredients (which I don‚Äôt think it is usually used). I was also expecting a fresh vibrant dish with mix of cold vegetables on top of hot rice and meat, however, they actually cooked the vegetables as well. Also felt like it wasn‚Äôt a classic take to the dish. and finally they drizzled a lot of mayonnaise type sauces that was unnecessary and creating a tasty meal; matter fact that actually ruined it in my opinion.
review 5: It is really hard to find good Mexican food anywhere outside Mexico, but this place really comes close, with their own twist (and is so much better than some of the other options in Canggu, *cough cough* Lola's). A bit out of the way, but an amazing owner with amazing food that shouldn't be missed if you have a craving for decent burritos.

name: SUGI DELUXE ROOM
address: 94FC+XPF, Munggu, Mengwi, Badung Regency, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: We've lived here for more than 6 months and it's perfect. Pak Gede and Pak Sugi are great people and they'll look after you. Sugi Deluxe Room is the best place I've lived in Bali and I highly recommend it.

name: Mesare Guest House
address: Jl. Sahadewa Gg. Wibisana II No.4, Munggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: I don't want to put a review because then next time it will be full. Best hotel in canggu is just ten minuts but still price for this amazing place with really confortable beds, tv and own toilet. The staff was excelent. I hope I'll be back we plan to stay. a couple of days and we stay for two weeks. Is close to sushitoo where you can get best sushi in canggu. And they have small but clean swimming pool! Such an amazing place.
review 2: Spacious, updated, and sparkling clean rooms with serene views overlooking a rice paddy. A staff member named Linda was exceptionally accommodating, cheerful, and a bright spot to our day. Stayed for three weeks and planning to go back!
review 3: Affordable homestay comes with clean & spacey room, clean bathroom, nice rice paddy view & plunge pool. The staff & the owner are very friendly & helpful. Laundry, mini markets & small restaurants (warung makan) are walking distance. It's a gem.
review 4: Must be the best value in all of Canggu! The room is clean and beautiful. View is nice and the price is very reasonable. Also, there is a woman who works here named Linda who has a heart of gold.
review 5: Mesare Guest House it was a brand new Guest House in the north of Canggu, It was set up like star rated hotel. It was really enjoy stay there as you will stay like home. In the middle of rice field and just 10 minutes to the beach and Tanah Lot

name: Umah Dangin Guesthouse Munggu
address: Jl. Sahadewa No.6, Munggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
Very beautiful guesthouse with ricefield view. Very comfortable and relaxing with big swimming pool and sharing kitchen.

Really recommended, you should try.

name: Evan Kos / Karunia Kasih Indekos (UD. Evan)
address: 94GF+M49, Munggu, Mengwi, Badung Regency, Bali 80351, Indonesia

name: Gardenia House
address: Jalan Sahadewa Gang Jepun, Munggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
Nyoman and his family are wonderful guests. The location is perfect ‚Äî close enough to Canggu but not too close. It‚Äôs a beautiful neighborhood with lots of local life, rice fields and kind people.
The accommodation is way bigger than we thought. The large desk allowed me to work from home. The bed is huge, and the bathroom is very nice since it‚Äôs open to the outside.
The swimming pool is perfect as it is ‚Äî not too big and not too small. The kitchen is well equipped.
For short or long stays, it‚Äôs an ideal place and we look forward to living here again next year. Thank you Nyoman üôè
review 2: love this place.  By chance, I lived here for quite a long time and I do not regret it.  it is a family business.  very nice and kind staff.  inside is clean and nicely decorated.  with taste!  the garden is lovely, the location too.  pet-friendly. In general, I recommend.
review 3: Had a very amazing experience staying here! The room was big enough and very comfortable, the view was lovely üòç it was also quiet and calm, most importantly the hosts were super friendly!!! They also clean your room and the pool everyday ü•∫ oh and the kitchen! It has everything you need (plates, bowls, pans, utensils, etc). Would love to come back here later in the future and I‚Äôd definitely recommend this place to my friends and family who are going to visit bali! ‚ù§Ô∏è
review 4:
Worst experience ever!
Arrived at Gardenia House to be told by staff, sorry we don't have accomodation for you as we have issues with the company you booked through. OMG, if you have issues with the company then delete the account. How many people have they wasted their time and money????
Gardenia House wasted my money and time and left me with no where to stay.
review 5: Everything about gardenia house was perfect.

name: Kubu Be-10 Bingin
address: 94GG+GFG, Munggu, Mengwi, Badung Regency, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: It was really a good place to stay  if you dont like noises. You can enjoy the rice field view. The staff are so helpful and friendly. Very recommended place to stay in Bali.
review 2: Staying here for about a month, I really had a great time. It's such a quiet place to stay and relax. They gave a very good service too. Will definitely come back again here.

name: KAIA Suites
address: Jl. Raya Munggu No.10, Munggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: Really nice price and place but fullü•≤
review 3: Alwayss love this place to stayü•∞

name: Sushitoo
address: Jl. Raya Munggu Jl. By Pass Tanah Lot No.depan, Cemagi, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
Honestly if you love sushi this place is it. These guys are great and full of respect and with that they make amazing sushi for a ridiculously cheap price. What else do you need?

Our fav was yummy yummy chicken
And for about 24 rolls of sushi it‚Äôll cost only 6euro and thats between two people

Keep it guys you deserve the best!!
review 2:
Not even joking, this place was a very small benchtops when my friend who had been living in Bali as an expat took us 5 years ago! Sushi chef did all in front of us on that day, nice and warm, amazingly fresh.
I asked to my friend if he is still doing this, she pointed out he kinda grew the business so I wanted to try if it's still good as it was 5 years ago! And he did NOT surprise, it is as amazing as it was ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è he deserves everything better , good luck chef üôèüèªüòÑ
review 3:
Fantastic sushi! Such a cute little place, a bit rogue but the sushi rolls are worth it!

We tried the Spider Crunch Roll, Spicy Tuna, and their best seller Kuta beach roll. 24 pieces of rolls between 2 of us. Looked a bit heavy at first but it was so tasty that we smashed it all!

Didn't even stop to take photos till there were only one or two pieces left! Not the best photos but believe me, so tasty!

Must visit! Super friendly staff as well! So sweet!!!
review 4: Highly recommend one cheap place to eat sushi in Bali. We went here for dinner and ended spending 100k per person with five dishes. My favourite was the tempura sushi. Though the place doesn‚Äôt have an ambience to dine in but taste and value for money is icing on the cake. I would definitely come here again for the yummiest sushi in Town. Not to forget the owners are the sweetest and serve the sushi real quick.
review 5:
At first, my friends and I were not really sure to try Sushitoo. But knowing this place has good reviews, we decided to go in.

The place is more like local eatery, but boy, the sushi here are good and fresh! We started with 2 plates, ended up with many more. We kept ordering. I couldn‚Äôt remember the names of their best selling sushi, but remember the numbers on the menu - 24,27,28!

Don‚Äôt hesitate to try. Thank me later!

name: Yes Madam
address: Jl. Werkudara No. 9, Munggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: The Laksa is to die for! It's pretty far from everywhere but the trip is worth it. Delicious and comforting. Pair it with the fresh sugar cane juice definitely will bring you back to Malaysia.
review 2: Great cozy spot serving AMAZING Malay food. The laksa is tasty with ample prawn and the soup is not too heavy. We ordered small bites (otak-otak and wings). Wings were crispy on the outside yet juicy and meaty; otak-otak also rich in flavor. Es Cendol was a great way to close the meal, not too sweet and the jelly is soft and chewy. We also met and had a chat with the owner who‚Äôs very friendly and welcoming. This is definitely the place to go if you‚Äôre looking for authentic, homey Malay food. I‚Äôm definitely going back there again.
review 3: I like it always improved, the broth the dishes the place. Laksa is my go to dish! ‚ú®
review 4:
I love restaurant that knows which products they are excelling in to the T and sticks by it. Yes Madam is doing exactly that.

The laksa is fresh, the soup is light and delicious. The prawns are succulent and sweet, the tofu is exactly like how I remember it.

The fried chicken is unlike anything I ever had before. Perfectly seasoned to the bone, generous in spices and flavour.

I like the portion tho, it is not too big so you won‚Äôt overeat. In fact it is just nice for you to order the whole menu.

Don‚Äôt forget to order their es cendol, it taste clean, the brown sugar is rich and aromatic.

I highly recommend this place, it is unlike any other place and definitely worth visiting.
review 5:
This place is too good! Feels like you can carry on with your day with no lag. Refreshing dishes w/ creative recipes.
Zero competition when it comes to Laksa. Hands down the best!
It‚Äôs not good Laksa if it isn‚Äôt sitting on a bright orange table, yes Madam.
